title: Raspberry Pi Project: Retro Game and Hip-Hop Album
description: Artist Official Sites: http://www.e5k4p4whoovmmdvl.onion http://www.saintignati.us Fundraiser: Binary Gospell brings music, retro gaming, and computing all together in this little but powerful Raspberry Pi project. The idea behind the project is to create a classic '90's era sound hip-hop album which will run parallel with a retro game themed to specifically reflect the album's musical content, with each audio track corresponding to a level within the retro game in all aspects. The digital copy of music album "Binary Gospell LP" by Saint Ignatius of Cyberspace will be made via digital download and via mobile app, supported on Android, iOS, and Windows platforms, and the digital download of the retro game will have the accessibility and compatibility options of PICO-8 web cart player, or exported to stand-alone HTML5, Windows, Mac and Linux apps. The autographed limited edition hard copy (CD), Hoodie, and T-Shirt rewards will be available for shipping worldwide. Finally, anyone wishing to pledge for the top-level reward will receive all rewards, with the addition of a autographed Raspberry Pi which was used in the creation process of this project. The top-level reward is limited to one person only. or Donate in Crypto: BTC: 1Pu1ymV3gb622E3GcTRPt2YZmomMzKyHES ETH: 0x700f358098df656c57abecb2c61f664efdd1f97d LTC: LTbXoG7UXaLhJCA1dbyoCgQvc2mSR67eTk
